amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the Selective Service System by $22,703,000 and apply the savings to spending reduction account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 294 (Roll no. 363).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 128 - 294 (Roll no. 363).
